Dates of inspection: SEP 16 |1 OCT 16 |1 NOV 04 |1 SEP 25 |1 OCT 21 |1 NOV 13 |1 SEP 29 1 OCT 27 |1 NOV 25 1 OCT 08 |1 NOV 01 |1 1
(B) Particulars of Scouring: Side channel that crosses Finlayson Rd. did not have any water in it this year.
(C) Water levels: Prolonged drought and low GVWD reservoir levels resulted in abnormally low water levels up to late November.
(E) Comments on predators: Some chinook were taken by otters.
(F) Egg digging: Fewer chums that in previous yrs.spawned in upper reaches.Gravel downstream of Finlayson Rd.was dug up several times by sp. chums.
(G) New obstructions: Log located 150 m up from Finlayson Bridge needs to be cut and removed from channel.
(H) recommended enhancement: Re-establish flows in the side channel, clean spawning gravel in side channel.
